themes: expansion of public arts funding to performing arts
recognition of playwrights as both literary and performing artists
key_phrases: I'd like to see Public Arts funding include performing arts - not just visual
the requirement for developers should extend beyond just statues
Advocate for State arts awards to include more than just literature and music and visual arts
Include playwrights in literature categories - we exist both within literary circles and performing arts
That's cross disciplinary support anytime you fund theatre!
barriers_identified: Public Arts funding limited to visual arts
State arts awards exclude certain disciplines
Playwrights not recognized in literature categories
solutions_proposed: Include performing arts in Public Arts funding
Extend developer requirements beyond just statues
Advocate for State arts awards to include more than just literature, music, and visual arts
